p: C. nubigenum plants were collected with the Ecuadorian Environmental authorization No. 006-2017-IC-FAU-FLO-DPAI/MAE. The essential oil of C. nubigenum was extracted from the flowering parts of plants collected in the mountains near Hacienda Zuleta (0°12'N, 78°04'W) (Imbaburra, Ecuador) in March 2017 by hydro-distillation in a Clevenger-type apparatus for two hours. The essential oils of Lavandula angustifolia was purchased from Sigma Aldrich (Milan, Italy).
